entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with rain changing to rain near noon and ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
